勒索软件周 - 2023 年 12 月 29 日 - LockBit 针对医院https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-december-29th-2023-lockbit-targets-hospitals/ Fri, 29 Dec 2023 15:39:47 -0500劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-december-29th-2023-lockbit-targets-hospitals/ It's been a quiet week, with even threat actors appearing to take some time off for the holidays. We did not see much research released on ransomware this week, with most of the news focusing on new attacks and LockBit affiliates increasingly targeting hospitals. [...]

恶意软件滥用 Google OAuth 端点“恢复”cookie、劫持帐户https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malware-abuses-google-oauth-endpoint-to-revive-cookies-hijack-accounts/ Fri, 29 Dec 2023 11:13:55 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityGoogle https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malware-abuses-google-oauth-endpoint-to-revive-cookies-hijack-accounts/ Multiple information-stealing malware families are abusing an undocumented Google OAuth endpoint named "MultiLogin" to restore expired authentication cookies and log into users' accounts, even if an account's password was reset.
